post.text: "Hillary Clinton needs to address the racist undertones of her 2008 campaign." #FlashbackFriday

comment.author: Patrick
comment.text: I wish people would start talking about what happened during Bill's run. Everyone seems to have forgotten about Janet Reno, Waco, Ruby Ridge, and a Border Patrol Tactical Team running a snatch and grab on a small boy named Elian Gonzalez. His policy of deporting every illegal alien and building a wall along the border. Why is nobody talking about this and how Hilary treated and treats her current Secret Service Detail. We as a nation need a Joe The Plumber and Donald J. Trump is that man. It is time to get rid of the good old boy system.

replies.author: Holly
replies.text: Bill served his term, Hillary stands on her own merits

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: Yes--let's list hillary's merits--shall we? Flunked the D.C. Bar Exam • Was removed from her House Judiciary Committee staffer job because of incompetence and lying. • The Whitewater scandal. • Married a serial liar and cheater, who occasionally had sexual encounters with nonconsenting partners. • Lied about "sniper fire" in an attempt to simulate exposure to danger in a war zone. • The subject of a "vast right-wing conspiracy" that led to the impeachment and disbarment of her husband • Took crockery, furniture, artwork and other items from the White House — had to return and/or pay for them. • Said "what difference, at this point, does it make" about four brave people killed in Libya as a direct result of her failure to protect them on the anniversary of 9/11. • Totally ignored the structure and rules for the handling of sensitive national security information. • Amassed a personal fortune with "speaking fees" and payments from private sector political donors and foreign governments into transparent "foundations" in obvious exchange for future political favor. I had to curtail this list because it exceeded the 8,000 character allowance!

replies.author: Bradley
replies.text: Holly please state Hillary's accomplishments. Make believe Google does not exists. If you are voting for her you should know them by heart, right?
